mapper.select: select e.field as 'emp_Name', e.email as 'emp_Email', d.Field as 'dep_Name', e.Emp_PK as 'emp_Id', Round((COUNT(CASE WHEN t.Status = '출근' THEN 1 END)/24)*100, 1) AS 'att_Rate' from Employees e join Department d on e.Dep_FK = d.Dep_PK join TimeAttendance t on e.Emp_PK = t.Emp_FK Group by e.field, e.email, d.Field, e.Emp_PK
select t.TA_PK as 'tapk', t.Status as 'status', Workday as 'workday', email as 'email' from Employees e join TimeAttendance t on e.Emp_PK = t.Emp_FK

select e.Field as 'ename', e.Emp_PK as 'emppk', e.email as 'email', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.Status = '출근' THEN 1 END) as 'total_workdays', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.Status = '결근' THEN 1 END) as 'total_absence', COUNT(CASE WHEN t.Status = '휴가' THEN 1 END) as 'total_vacation' from Employees e Join TimeAttendance t on e.Emp_PK = t.Emp_FK group by e.Field, e.Emp_PK
